snippet.title: Uncharted: Drake's Fortune Remastered Trailer
snippet.description:
Jump into the perilous journey that kick-started the legendary escapades of Nathan Drake. Hunt for the lost treasure of El Dorado, with the help of courageous journalist Elena Fisher and Drake’s mentor and friend Victor “Sully” Sullivan.

Experience the classic PlayStation®3 adventure that redefined the genre, now on PlayStation®4: http://www.game.co.uk/en/uncharted-drakes-fortune-remastered-1716419
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Twitter: @GAMEdigital
